transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ha sir, good morning.
Customer: Good morning sir.
Executive: Ji Ashraf baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se, kaise hai?
Customer: Ha boliye.
Executive: Ji kal actually me maine evening me call lagayi thi but shayad aap busy rahe honge. To.
Customer: Nahi aapka to evening me call nahi aaya tha. Wahi aapne bola ki ek ghante baad call karenge, uske baad call bhi nahi aaya tha.
Executive: Ji aata hai sir dekho mai aapko exactly batau.
Customer: 6 baje. 6 baje aapke paas call gayi thi meri. To kisi ne receive nahi kiya tha tabhi.
Customer: Abhi mujhe ek baar bataiyega kya humko yaha pe changes karne hai basically aapke website me?
Executive: Ha dekhiye, pehle meri baat suniye. Actually hum logo ka jo IndiaMART ka jo website hai, thik hai? Ha sir. IndiaMART ka website me uske andar agar koi hum logo ka jo shyamnamkin.in jo website hai, thik hai?
Customer: IndiaMART ramnamkin.in hai thik hai.
Executive: .in. IndiaMART se jo message aata hai ki aap ye shyamnamkin.in pe click kijiye, aapko hum logo ka details show hoga. Thik hai?
Customer: Thik hai sir, thik hai.
Customer: To show hoga, isme kya hota hai?
Executive: Ha.
Customer: To pehle jab hum Rahul sir ji ke saath baat kar rahe the, tab kya hua? To bole ki mai bola ki hum logo ka jo category me jo product hai, catalog me, agar IndiaMART se koi wo dikhayi deta hai aur isme to hum logo ka bahut sara package me changes hai. Matlab kuch kuch photo hai jaise ki 500 gram ka matlab weight hai packed hai but photo me likha hua hai photo jo diya hua hai 5 rupay ka. Aisa kuch list match bahut sara tha. To unko bole wo bole ki hum logo ka ye changes to aap nahi kar payenge hum kara denge. To thik hai kara do hum details bhej diye unko nahi karae. To parso din jo baat hua tha Friday ko ek madam ke saath.
Executive: Madam se Simran se baat hui thi ji.
Customer: Simran ji ke saath baat hua tha. Wo bol rahe hai ki pehle aap ye to aap bhi kar sakte hai matlab kaise? Bole ki pehle IndiaMART me aap jo product jo diye ho, product ka details diya hai usme galat hai. Agar usko thik kar denge to aapka ye jo catalog automatically update ho jayega.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm thik hai. Nahi mismatch aisa kuch hai ki jaise jaise agar maan lo 500 gram ka likha hua hai mention hai aur usme jo photo lagi hai wo koi chhote size wali lagi hai aisa keh rahe hai aap?
Customer: Ha ha ha.
Executive: To wo to aap apne hisab se edit kar sakte ho photos me daal ke naya laga sakte ho.
Customer: Wahi to nahi mai pehle pehle jo sir handle kar rahe the wo to abhi thoda dusre kaam pe hai na mai usko abhi handle kiya to ye sab dekha. To wo madam ne bola nahi nahi pehle usko agar aap edit karke thik karenge na to automatically aap logo ka India jo shyamnamkin.in jo catalog me hai wo automatic thik ho jayega.
Executive: But agar logically dekho sir to aap jis hisab se jaise maan lo 335 gram ka packet hai thik hai? Aur usme agar koi aur photo to zahir si baat hai waha pe.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Pata hai seller panel diya hi isliye gaya hai ki client apne hisab se isme changes kar sake kyuki dekho.
Customer: Apne hisab se jitne bhi.
Executive: To wo catalog in diya gaya hai ki aapko isme na apne according sahi kar sakte ho isme. To ye to aap kar loge apne hisab se ki agar 500 gram ka packet hai to 500.
Customer: Hello. Ha aur ek cheez bolna chahunga. Ha bataiye bataiye. Aur ek cheez bolna chahunga sir mera jo kaam hai actually hum logo ka jo shyamnamkin.in shyamnamkin.in pe jo bhi product show hoga to hum logo ko matlab right product show hona chahiye.
Executive: Thik hai. Right. Right matlab?
Customer: Matlab jo hum pehle bole na yaha pe jo 300 gram maan lo 300 gram ka packet hai usme likha hua hai idhar 500 5 rupay ka packet chipka hua hai ya phir zara ya phir aapko bhujiya ka packet hai but waha pe show ho raha hai pakoda. Jaise usko hum jo sahi kar sakte hai. Jaise ki hum matlab example de rahe hai thik hai na? To hum logo ko shyamnamkin.in pe wo sab alag alag show ho raha tha. To madam ko bola pehle aap ha.
Executive: To sir aap shyamnamkin.in ko chhodo abhi aapko karna ye hai ki jo seller panel aap jo login karte ho na IndiaMART wala seller seller.indiamart.com usme aap jao product section me aur ek ek product ko review karo. Thik hai? Ek 61 hi products hai. Thik hai? Ab jaise pehla product hai 500 gram ka special save. Thik hai? Ab usme humko dekh lena hai ki photo sahi lagi hai sari ki nahi. Thik hai? Plus ki usme price aapne sahi diya hai ki nahi jaise 160 kilo likha hai. Thik hai? Packaging size kya hai? To ye ek baar go through aap khud hi kar loge to aapko idea lag jayega ki kya isme sahi karne ko hai aur kya nahi sahi karne ko hai. Jo sahi karne ko hai.
Customer: Usme to usme to hum usme humko idea to nahi tha us din se hum do din se kar chuke hai aap already 20 22 item hum update kiye hai jo sab matlab wo matlab galat tha. Abhi 22 item hum likh ke rakhe hai 22 ya 44 item hum abhi tak thik kar diye hai. Thik hai na?
Executive: Achha achha achha achha. Mera baat ye hai ki hum log isme to update kar denge thik hai? Isme website pe change ho jayega. Ho jayega to wahi aur kya? Jab sir yaha pe ye to yahi cheez to hai ki aap yaha maan lo ki jaise yaha pe ek aapne product add kiya to wo aapka jo shyamnamkin.in hai waha pe wo show karne lagega within matlab aap maan ke chalo aadhe ghante me.
Customer: Mujhe yahi chahiye mujhe mere boss ko yahi chahiye ki shyamnamkin.in me jo hai agar kuch bhul bhal hai bahut sara hai galat hai to bhai sahi karne ka to bilkul avsar milna chahiye kyuki bhai aisa galat cheez thodi na chala karke aap sell karoge. Aap maan lo 500 gram ki cheez ka jo hai 5 rupay me koi mangega 500 gram ki cheez maan lo 160 kilo hai wo 5 rupay mangega to wo to gadbad hai na agar galti se likh gaya to wo to aap sahi kar sakte ho apne hisab se. Ye to 25 gram ka chura mixture hai.
Executive: Ha sir boliye boliye. Pehle jo handle IndiaMART handle kar rahe the na unko ye sab itna malum nahi tha na to.
Executive: Sir wo sabko bas selling ke liye rehte hai mujhe pata hai na mai.
Customer: Unko malum nahi tha. Actually technically jo kaam hota hai mai kar leta hu. Online jitna sara kaam hota hai ye sab mai kar leta hu. To boss ne mere ko bola ki dekho thoda issue kya hua mai dekha ki bahut sara galat hai. To iski galat ke hisab se but Azad ji mere ko wrong information diya. Bola ki aap nahi kar paoge usme ab humko karna padega humko details bhej dijiye hum karenge. To hum unko detail bhej diye to wo bhi kar de uske baad wo phone receive nahi kiya hai thik hai na?
Executive: Wo sir dekho sell karne ke baad sab gayab ho lete hai. Dekho actual information mai aapko deta hu sahi sahi. Dekho pehle first of all jo abhi aapki services dekhi ja rahi hai IndiaMART ke head office se dekhi ja rahi hai aur mai hu yaha pe relationship manager aur mujhe IndiaMART me ho gaye hai 7 saal. To mujhe most probably matlab 90 se 90% cheeze actual me pata hai hai na bina gumrah kiye. Thik hai? Ab jo bhi changes aap apne seller panel ke through karoge na product addition deletion wo within half an hour jo hai aapke website pe reflect kar jata hai kispe shyamnamkin.in pe. To jab bhi aap shyamnamkin.in pe jaye koi changes karke to ek baar page ko refresh jarur kar le.
Customer: Ha ha. Hogi ek baar refresh kar le. Fir aap dekho ki wo changes hue ki nahi hue. Ho jate hai.
Executive: 99% ho jate hai. Kabhi kabhar ho sakta hai koi gadbadi ki wajah se na ho raha ho lekin wo 99% sare update ho jate hai immediately. Thik hai? Ab isme ek cheez aur aapko karni hogi ab aap ek baar ye bhi dekh lena har product me na niche ek group likh ke aata hai hai na to group bhi shayad aapne kuch banaya ho to grouping ko bhi change aap kar sakte ho.
Customer: Ha ha. Wo sab hum hum ekdam har cheez ko dhyan se karte hai do din se kar diye hai to. Ha idea lag gaya hoga to kafi aapne kaam kiya hoga.
Executive: To naya rehta hai na sir starting me naya rehta hai ho jao to sab easy. Mai bhi ek relation manager kaam kar raha tha aap matrimony.com jante ho na? Kispe sir kispe? matrimony.com jante ho na? Ha ha ha ha. Hum usme 5 saal relationship executive manager the thik hai? Customer service. Ha aur usme hum sell bhi karte the customer ko service bhi dete the.
Customer: Service bhi dete the yahi hai sir yaha pe sales and service hi hai. Same same platform hai aapka wo isse dusra cheez hai.
Executive: Same profile hi hai same profile hai sir isliye. Abhi kaisa kaam hum kaisa chal raha hai sir waise matlab IndiaMART ke through kuch business start hua ya kaisa hai?
Customer: Nahi actually IndiaMART se abhi kuch lead milta nahi. Jo bhi lead aata hai na actually kya hota hai pata nahi jo bhi lead rehta hai wo retail lead hota hai koi do packet koi 10 packet ya aise kuch matlab jaise ki bada jo distributor hota hai wo logo ka lead nahi aata hai matlab unko show nahi hota hai kya milega aisa add hum type hota hai.
Executive: Aisa kuch bhi nahi hai. Nahi nahi nahi mai aapko samjhata hu ye bhi samjhata hu mai aapko. Aisa kuch bhi nahi hai ki kisi ne agar hamara sabse chhota package liya ya hamara kisi sabse bada package liya to usme koi difference hai kuch difference nahi hai lead me khaskar. Thik hai? Lead dekho kyuki jo IndiaMART pe post hua requirement us pe hak sabka hai. Thik hai? To wo jaise hi post hui wo aapko bhi dikhegi leader aur industry leader sabko dikhegi. Thik hai? Samajh gaye itni baat. Ab difference kaha aata hai call aur inquiry me kyuki agar hamara package maan lo ek medioker package hai to ho sakta hai waha tak buyer jo hai pahunche call aur inquiry kam aaye hai na as compare to ekdam top wale level ka jo agar kisi ne plan le rakha hai. Thik hai? To difference aata hai wo inquiry ya calls me aata hai hai na bylead sabke liye same hai. Ha. Bylead sabke liye same hai. Aur koshish kara karo abhi kya all over India kar rahe ho sir ya kuch specific region me kar rahe ho aap log kaam?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi hum log all over India me hai hum logo ka maal bhi to abhi UP ja raha hai Bangalore ja raha hai. Hum log UP Bangalore jo dete hai na wo hum log khud contact kiye matlab IndiaMART se nahi hai matlab hum logo ka jo hai.
Executive: Ha ha starting se aap log kar rahe ho IndiaMART se sir abhi thoda bhi mai batau abhi jaise na thoda aapko time lagega starting me. Pair jamane me thoda time lagega ispe kyuki abhi jo ye service aapne pehle isse kuch chala rahe the aur usme abhi aapne maximizer bhi recently kiya hai. Hai na?
Customer: Nahi pehle jo hum jo IndiaMART se use kar rahe the wo to expire ho gaya renewal kiye humne.
Executive: Ha renewal kiya hai aapne. To phir wo jaise abhi aap services badhaoge ek to wo service ka usage matlab ek kaam aap nahi kar rahe ho abhi mai aapko batata hu. Jo lead manager me aapke paas data aa raha hai lead ho chahe wo inquiry ho chahe wo call ho us pe na reply utne nahi ja rahe hai. Reply bole to lead manager me option aata hai niche reply karne ka har ek buyer ko to waha pe template hai chhote chhote to waha pe jaise catalog link send karne ka option hai hai na product is available how much quantity you required aise chhote chhote templates aate hai. Har ek har ek inquiry ko ya buyer ko jo bhi hai na us pe teen teen reply aap mandatorily karo. To isse aapko kya hoga benefit ki jis city se wo buyer aaya tha waha pe aapka preference badhega aur jis product ke liye wo aaya tha usme preference badhega do cheeze hai thik hai city aur aapka product. To jab ye aap karna start kar doge to aapko jo hai difference nazar aane lagega ek hafte ke andar ye. Achha. Inquiry ka flow aur call ka flow bhi increase karega aapka iski wajah se. Achha hum jisko reply de denge wo hum abhi abhi dekh rahe hai ek party hai jaise ki XYZ company hai wo requirement hum usko catalog bhej de ya phir product details bhej de ya phir kuch bhi hum bhej sakte hai. Ha matlab teen teen reply karo sir aap usme kuch bhi karo lekin teen reply karo. Ab wo reply karke matlab IndiaMART algorithm isko aap thoda follow karo baki aapko jaise bhi follow karna hai whatsapp karna hai call karna hai mail karna wo aap karo apni cheeze. Ha ha. Samajh gaye aap meri baat suno. To isse benefit hoga phir mai ratings and reviews aapke dekh pa raha hu IndiaMART pe to hai na kafi customers ne reviews dekho idhar recently kafi customer ka review achha nahi aaya hai sir. Hai na to usko thoda samajhna padega ki unko kya dikkat hui humne unko time se contact nahi kiya ya hamara price nahi unko sahi baitha ki unhone aisa humko feedback diya waise to four out of five hai lekin jo recently kuch customers ka feedback hai wo sahi hai October me aaye the ek ka ek star ek teen star hai thoda is pe aapko soch vichar karna padega hai na lead manager ka usage kyuki ghat gaya hai jo ki maine bataya ab aap karne lagoge to isse bhi aapko result dikhna start ho jayega aane wale time me. Calls bhi jo aa bhi rahi hai to wo bhi puri miss kar de rahe ho sir aap log dekh rahe ho teen call receive hai 11 call aisa nahi sorry sorry. Ek minute. Dusre ka account hai. Aa gaya apna galat bata diya maine call wala aapko. TCS power hai na? Ha ha ha. TCS power me aapka calls ha jaise calls jaise October me na nine call receive ki char call miss ki aur is month me bhi aayi hai teen call receive hai ek call miss hai. Koshish karo ki call miss na ho. To ye jo jo chart aapko abhi kam dikh raha hai na ki 12 13 call aa rahi hai mahine ki aapke ratio badh jayega aane ka. Jab customer hamare matlab aapka footfall badhega aapke page pe to phir aap jyada achhe customers nikal paoge. Hai ki nahi? Abhi aur koi sir changes waise to aap khud hi ab aap samajh gaye ho ki changes kar sakte ho mai mera number sir aap note kar lo ek baar. Ha na aapke liye 8076 8076 ha 36 36 2095 2095 thik hai na to isse Ashraf Ashraf Ashraf is pe sir na ek agar ho sake to whatsapp kar do mujhe. Ha ha. Ha to phir mai aapse contact me aa jaunga to jo koi bhi maan lo kyuki dekho abhi abhi to kuch kuch changes aap kar hi rahe ho aur kuch na kuch question aata hi rahega aapke dimag me starting me. Ha ha aur aur ek cheez to mujhse ha boliye boliye. Any time. Aur ek cheez bolna chahenge hum log yaha pe jo buyleads me dekh rahe hai yaha pe jo details hai na bahut sara hum logo ka hum log ke hai namkeen ka thik hai? To waha pe sab bahut sara leads aata hai jaise ki koi dusra cheez ka matlab maan lo daal ka ho maan lo ya phir makkhan ka ho wo sab matlab isme koi namkeen me koi related nahi hai hum logo ka business ka koi related nahi hai waise bahut sara leads aata hai.
Executive: Moong daal ka aa raha hai moong daal ka ek aa raha hai sahi karu usko?
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to correct product details on website.

- Wrong product details showing on website.

- Retail leads received, not distributor leads.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to edit product details.

- Executive shared his contact number for assistance.

- Executive explained how lead preferences work.

- Executive suggested replying to leads for better results.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will WhatsApp the executive.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- product details, website, buyleads, leads, seller panel
